评论详情: This is a very nice shirt. Delivery took about 2 weeks, but the product is worth the wait.

Firstly it’s the wrong size. Ordered medium extra large was sent. The material was not what I was expecting. Not the light weight fabric that I’m accustomed to and lastly the picture was much prettier than the actual shirt.

评论概述: El producto corresponde a lo establecido.
评论详情: Buena confección y tela de buena calidad. Corte adecuado al talle solicitado.  Muy conforme.
Great fabric and colors design. Very comfortable.

The shirt WOULD have been nice, but the color was off. You have to print out your own return papers too. They don’t make returns easy. Otherwise, it fit well in size small but it was too long. It almost touched under my butt. I bought Size small and I’m 133 and 5 feet 3.
Very soft & comfy to wear! And I get compliments when I wear!
Great fit! I’m 5’3  127lbs  36D got a small and if you don’t like your shirt snug size up!
Cute top but the colors are a little off

Took a couple weeks to get but it's from China so expected.  Nice material, sits nice on the body but the arms and neckline were too big for me.  I wanted it to be comfy, not tight but just way too big.  Maybe order a size smaller than what you'd think.
